turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. I wanted to get some pizzas ordered from Bella Luna. Can you help me with that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let's get the order started. what did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I kind of know what I want, but I wanted to check with you to see what the specialty pizza options are. Like what kinds of pizza specialty pizzas does Bella Luna have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, there is meat lovers and veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: meat lovers has sausage, bacon, ham, pepperoni, and prosciutto.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay well, why don't you get me four small pizzas with thin crust?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, did you want me to tell you what's in veggie lovers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure, why not? Let me know.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: veggie lovers has green peppers, mushooms, tomatoes, and pickles.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: mushrooms.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, mushrooms.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Well, why don't you make one of the small pizzas a veggie lover, one of them make it a meat lover, and then I want one with sun-dried tomato and feta cheese. And then I want another one with artichoke hearts and bell pepper.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. You want 4 small pizzas all with thin crust, 1 veggie lovers, 1 meat lovers, 1 with Sundried tomatoes and feta, 1 with artichoke hearts and bell peppers.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $46.92 is the total. do you want me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Go ahead and put it in and I'll pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order, it'll be ready in 35 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I think I'm all set. Thanks very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. enjoy your pizzas.
